title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 576

content.text:
Mr. HUNTER. Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be 
removed as a cosponsor of H. Res. 576.
content.speaker: Mr. HUNTER

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Taylor). Is there objection to the 
request of the gentleman from California?
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Taylor)

doc_title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. RES. 576
